ReqText: The system shall be capable of operating in both indoor and outdoor terrains.
The system shall have remote control capacity between 3-20 ft.
The system shall become autonomous if there is no signal through the remote control after 30 seconds.
The system shall be able to carry cargo up to 40 lbs.
The system shall observe 360 degrees in 30 second intervals when the system is turned on.
The system shall grab food container-type trash and dispose off it.
The system mass shall be less than 5kg
